Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.CGC

Class CGC5Test

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.CGC.CGC5Test
public class CGC5Test extends Object
test to check the correct behaviour of CGC5 with all the possible scenarios

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CGC5Test()
     

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    createCardTest()
    Test createCardTest creates an instance of CGC5 and checks if all parameters are correct.
    void
    emptyShelfTest()
    Test emptyShelfTest checks that the card is not accepted when the shelf is empty.
    void
    failTest1()
    Test failTest1 checks if checkConditions returns 0 when there are 5 groups with exactly 2 elements and one group with only one element.
    void
    failTest2()
    Test failTest2 checks if checkConditions returns 0 when there are 5 groups with at least 2 elements and one group with only one element.
    void
    failTest3()
    Test failTest3 checks if checkConditions returns 0 when there are only 5 groups with at least 2 elements.
    Shelf
    getTestShelf()
    getTestShelf method returns the shelf used for the tests.
    void
    setUp()
    Method setUp creates a new shelf, a new ArrayList of tiles and a new CGC5 before each test.
    void
    sixOccTest1()
    Test sixOccTest1 checks if 6 groups each with a different tile type from the others and each with exactly 2 elements are correctly identified.
    void
    sixOccTest2()
    Test sixOccTest2 checks if 6 groups each with a different tile type from the others and each with at least 2 elements are correctly identified.
    void
    sixOccTest3()
    Test sixOccTest3 checks if 6 groups regardless of their tile type each with at least 2 elements are correctly identified.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach public void setUp()
      Method setUp creates a new shelf, a new ArrayList of tiles and a new CGC5 before each test.

      @Test public void createCardTest()
      Test createCardTest creates an instance of CGC5 and checks if all parameters are correct.

    • emptyShelfTest

      @Test public void emptyShelfTest()
      Test emptyShelfTest checks that the card is not accepted when the shelf is empty.

    • sixOccTest1

      @Test public void sixOccTest1()
      Test sixOccTest1 checks if 6 groups each with a different tile type from the others and each with exactly 2 elements are correctly identified.

    • sixOccTest2

      @Test public void sixOccTest2()
      Test sixOccTest2 checks if 6 groups each with a different tile type from the others and each with at least 2 elements are correctly identified.

    • sixOccTest3

      @Test public void sixOccTest3()
      Test sixOccTest3 checks if 6 groups regardless of their tile type each with at least 2 elements are correctly identified.

    • failTest1

      @Test public void failTest1()
      Test failTest1 checks if checkConditions returns 0 when there are 5 groups with exactly 2 elements and one group with only one element.

    • failTest2

      @Test public void failTest2()
      Test failTest2 checks if checkConditions returns 0 when there are 5 groups with at least 2 elements and one group with only one element.

    • failTest3

      @Test public void failTest3()
      Test failTest3 checks if checkConditions returns 0 when there are only 5 groups with at least 2 elements.
